properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 v5 c2 v6 c2 v7 c2 c1

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ellapadu memu ninne stotrichuchundu stuti idiye sundara rakshakudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rajaadhi raaja neeve maa shaaronu roja neeve Thwaragaa vathunanina goppa devaa narula mamu Joodumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vyaadhigrastula vaidyudaa yooda gotramuna buttithi Naarthu raalaina naayeenu vidhava kumaaruni lepitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ratna varna vadanudaa yooda kanya mariya kaatmajaa Manninchi paramuna jerchu vaada mammu brema joodumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naakamu pattaleni vaadaa lokamunaku vachchitee Jeeva paanamitchi daahamu theerchitivi heenunilo nundumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Margam satyam jeevamai mammu kunkaka kaapaaduchu ara Chetilo mammu chekki yunnavaadaa manchi golla boyudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ashcharyakaruda neeve manchi aalochana kartayu Baludaina devudu nityudagu thandri samaadhaana prabhuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Halleluya paadanu mahaa satyaatma varameeyanu Nyaayamu theerchuta keethenchu vaadaa nilvaka raarammayaa{/lang-eng}
